attributes.action: Restore the money to physics research
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To be charitable, there appears to have been a mistake in the funding available to the STFC which means that univerisity physics departments and major international projects are £80 million or so short.

Whatever the reason it is poor long term policy to cut funding to fundamental science and will drive the very people we desperately need overseas.  It is also very unfair to those who may become unemployed.

Please find the money to restore the funding and ensure this will not happen again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
